commentTextItems.html: He took the front leg out of the line and swung a length delivery across the line. Game over. It will be a India-Pakistan final.The Bangladesh fielders congratulate Gambhir who takes the helmet off and walks off to the pavilion.

commentPostTextItems.html: We'll take you through the post-match presentation now.
The Man of the Match is Gautam Gambhir. "I've been hitting the ball well. When you get dropped from the side you try to rectify your mistakes and I think my hunger has increased a lot."
Mohammad Ashraful: "We were short 30-40 runs. Raqibul and I got a good partnership but we needed to get a 100-run partnnership. This was a good wicket to bat on."
Dhoni: "We have moved inches above the last series. The lower order hasn't got an opportunity to bat but we are prepared for the final." That's all from me here.

commentTextItems.html: on the leg and middle, full in length, Raina defends down the track.

commentPostTextItems.html: Phil on Gambhir playing against the spin: "Your comments at 29.6 evoked  fond memories of Faroukh Engineer dancing down the pitch. An Engineer-ed ton."
HRG pings us: "Gambhir's 100 in this game represents the 150th hundred by Indian batsmen in ODIs. India is the only country in ODIs to have 150 hundreds."

bouncer on the leg stump line and Gambhir ducks
charges down the track and slams a length delivery on the up and through covers.

commentTextItems.html: And almost on cue, Yuvraj gets bowled after the event. Full, straight and Yuvraj tried to whip it across the line, missed and loses his middle stump. Holding would have drawled, "If you miss, I hit"

And that's his hundred and both batsmen celebrate in the middle as they set off for the run. It was a short-of-length delivery and punched through extra over. Gambhir pumps his fist, Yuvi raises his bat and in the back ground Raina whistles!
overpitched outside off stump, sweetly timed covers and there is a fumble. Gambhir comes on strike. 99.
length delivery on the stumps, pushed to the on side and they pick up a single after the direct hit ricochets off the stumps
well outside the off stump, Gambhir jabs at it, bat hit the ground, the ball nestles into the 'keeper's gloves
short of length, just outside off, punched to covers.
Dhoni signals to just block it - everyone wants Gauti to score a ton- not that Yuvraj would have seen the signal but he does just that. Gambhir smiles at Yuvi .
